body.p:
The setup program accepts optional command line parameters:
/h: provide help information
/S: run setup in silent mode
/server=url1,url2: set server(s) URL
/tag=tagname: set agent tag
/user=username: set user name
/pass=password: set password
/realm=realm: set realm (optional)
/ca-cert-file=filename: set certificate file name
/no-ssl-check: disable certificate checking when establishing SSL connection
/proxy=http://proxy/: set a proxy
/debug: set debug mode
/rpc-trust-localhost: allow local user to wake agent up
/scan-homedirs: look for virtual machines in user's home directories
/runnow: start the inventory process at the end of the installation
